extendedInfo.description: Here is a new list with nasty food additives that we should avoid eating. Artificial food preservatives, food colors and flavor enhancers, these are dangerous chemicals added to our food and are known to be linked to Hyperactivity, Attention-Deficit Disorder (ADD), Asthma, Cancer and other medical conditions.

reviews.title: i love this app
reviews.comment: i love this app, every time i go at supermarket i used to verify all my products
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads showing up in my Notification bar
reviews.comment: Description does not inform users that they\342\200\231ll get AirPush ads or what that might mean. Very disappointed in this add, it started doing this since last update. If you have the same problem you can download \"AirPush Detector\" which will halp you sort out apps that are AirPush ads to your notification bar or even to you iternet browser ...
reviews.author: A Google User
